item.title: Instagram Shortcode in Hugo
item.author: mail@khusika.com (Khusika Dhamar Gusti)
item.description: Hugo it self has built-in Instagram shortcode supports, but for some reason it can’t be used anymore. In this article i will write about how to solve this problem in your Hugo environment.
